biotools.summary: Fluxer is a web application for the computation and interactive visualization of flux graphs from genome-scale metabolic models. Flux Balance Analysis is used to calculate the flux of the metabolic network, which can then be visualized with spanning trees, k-shortest paths, and complete graphs
